title: Scott Peters (politician)
added: Peters opposes expanding [[offshoredrilling]] and has supported efforts to ban off-shore drilling in the Gulf of Mexico.<ref name="EnergyOilOTI">{{cite web |title=Scott Peters on Energy & Oil |url=https://www.ontheissues.org/ca/Scott_Peters_Energy_+_Oil.htm |website=On the Issues |accessdate=22 November 2020}}</ref>

title: Scott Peters (politician)
added: Peters opposes expanding [[offshore drilling]] and has supported efforts to ban off-shore drilling in the Gulf of Mexico. He supports [[nuclear energy]] and investing in advanced nuclear technologies.<ref name="EnergyOilOTI">{{cite web |title=Scott Peters on Energy & Oil |url=https://www.ontheissues.org/ca/Scott_Peters_Energy_+_Oil.htm |website=On the Issues |accessdate=22 November 2020}}</ref>

title: Scott Peters (politician)
deleted: Peters says he would prefer that Congress develop a strategy to deal with climate change, but that in lieu of congressional action, he would support President Obama's moves toward bypassing Congress and looking for an international climate change deal.<ref>{{cite news|last1=Joseph|first1=Cameron|title=Vulnerable Dem backs Obama on climate change move|url=http://thehill.com/blogs/ballot-box/house-races/216118-vulnerable-dem-backs-obama-on-climate-change-move|accessdate=11 September 2014|work=The Hill|date=2014-08-27}}</ref>

title: Scott Peters (politician)
added: Peters supports background check requirements for every firearm sale and transfer.<ref>{{cite web |title=Scott Peters on Gun Control |url=https://www.ontheissues.org/ca/Scott_Peters_Gun_Control.htm |website=On the Issues |accessdate=22 November 2020 |date=12 June 2020}}</ref>
